description.value:
Undead and demons react poorly to the touch of this liquid.

Level: 1
Category: Alchemical Item (Volatile)
Time: 1 hour
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Formula Cost: 50 gp
Key Skill: Religion

Attack Power (Radiant) âœ¦ Consumable (Minor Action)

Attack: Ranged 3/6 (one undead creature or demon); the item's level + 3 vs. Reflex

Hit: 1d10 radiant damage.

Level 11 or 16: 2d10 radiant damage.

Level 21 or 26: 3d10 radiant damage.



Published in Divine Power, page(s) 157, Mordenkainen's Magnificent Emporium, page(s) 132.
